features.situation: From those who benefit directly from your skills.

Success at an appropriate covered skill lets you scround equipment for another skill and eliminates level of the penalty for improvised equipment. Shift rolls by level to avoid harm from tampering with mundane mechanisms.
From anyone who is Curious or harbors Delusions about conspiracies.
Bonus in Contests against attempts to perpetrate a cover-up.
From anybody who cares about trivia.
Bonus anywhere Eidetic Memory gives a bonus
From most police officers and detectives, bouncers, gangsters, and street thugs.
Bonus to resist Interrogation and Intimidation, and to Fright Checks resulting from encountering murder victims, bloody torture scenes, etc.
From death-worshippers and sapient undead you don’t try to exorcize or banish.
Bonus to fright checks from undead and bodies
From investigators and anybody hiring you to investigate.
Bonus to resist verbal influence attempts
From scouts, campers, and survivalists.
Success with Scrounging improvises simple equipment for other skills that removes -1/level from the penalty for being improvised (p. B345).
From acrobats, skydivers, and commandos who slide down ropes.
Bonus to DX anywhere Perfect Balance would apply
From all members of the character’s organization below his Rank, as well as enemy agents of roughly equal Rank who are aware of his identity.
Bonus to rank for clearance and aid, but not for authority or pay.
From other martial artists, especially potential masters or students.
Bonus on rolls to be heard (compare Penetrating Voice, p. B101), and to Intimidation attempts made after using one of the affected skills.
From shady characters in town.
Bonus to notice inner city dangers and scams and to Tracking in built up areas.
From other street operators.
Bonus to notice inner city dangers and scams and to Tracking in built up areas.
Bonus to Per to notice people sneaking within arms reach of you
From hunters, trackers, etc.
Bonus to Per rolls to keep track of a specific quarry you’ve already spotted using other skills.
From spirits.
From social and political thinkers, theorists, and activists.
Bonus to Acting, Disguise, and Fast-Talk to pass as a member of another political/religious group.
From con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.
Bonus to resist covered skills
From sailors, pirates, and aquatic races sympathetic to sea travel.
Bonus to resist seasicknes and reduce unfamiliarity penalties for system on an appropriate boat or ship. Bonus to Carousing and Streetwise in port towns.
From scholars, students, and people who consult you.
Bonus to IQ defaults to non-covered skills for general knowledge only
From psis.
Bonus to self control rolls after a successful Meditation, Mental Strength, or Mind Block
From obsessive pop culture devotees.
Bonus to Influence or Carousing to demonstrate you are "cool".

MbIxS60J13WZyU_S3.name: Choose as many specialisms as are needed

features.situation: From obsessive pop culture devotees.
Bonus to Influence or Carousing to demonstrate you are "cool".
From readers and listeners of your work; literati.
Bonus to the first Influence roll (p. B359) of any kind made on an audience member (or several of them as a group) after a successful performance.
From miners.
Bonus to will for Extra Effort when digging, HT on failure at such, and all rolls to avoid disasters in mines
From psis and beleivers.
Bonus to resist powers that have been examined with covered skills
From explorers and nature lovers.
Bonus to HT rolls to avoid harm from failure of covered skills
From students of the arcane, gullible college students, monster-hunters.
Bonus to Fright Checks caused by supernatural beings and effects, and by reading sanity-destroying tomes (because you know what to expect).
From scientists and those impressed by "smart people".
Reduce TL and familiarity penalties for gear examined for an hour with a covered skill
From expert divers and aquatic beings.
Bonus to HT for breath holding time and resisting the Bends, Nitrogen Narcosis, etc.
From police and PIs.
Bonus to unskilled Per rolls to notice clues, and to all rolls to use Intuition
From sports fans, coaches, and recruiters.
Bonus to HT to recover from injuries resulting from failures with covered skills
From audiences and Critics.
Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.
Bonus to intimidate when victim at your mercy and you are threatening with a covered weapon
From the foolish and weak-minded.
Bonus to resist any of the affected skills.
From other memeticists who see you working.
Bonus to resist Brainwashing, Fast-Talk, and Propaganda
From engineers and scientists.
Bonus to resist deception involving numbers
From workers on projects, prospective employers.
Bonus to avoid common workplace hazards, even if used as traps
From seafarers.
Bonus to resist seasicknes
To reduce unfamiliarity penalties for systems on an appropriate boat or ship
From political parties seeking candidates; Anyone who put you in power.
Bonus to influence rolls to be chosen over another for a job or posting, or to cover up a failure with a covered skill.
From anyone you serve with or command.
Bonus to initiative roll if leader
From anyone you serve with or command.
Bonus to initiative roll if leader
From pacifists, Ascetics, Soft stylists.
Bonus to resist mundane disease
Bonus in contests against covered skills
From other Pilots.
Reduce penalties for unfamiliar systems of vehicles you have Piloting skill for
From patients.
Bonus to HT rolls for a specific patient and condition if treated full time.
From patients.
Bonus to HT rolls for a specific patient and condition if treated full time.
From gardeners and Sentient plants.
Bonus to rolls to survive made by plants in your care.
From beneficiaries, prospective spouses, other housewives.
Bonus to defaults made in your own home to repair, maintain, and protect it.
From buyers and Critics.
From druids, Faeries, and bunnies.
Bonus to notice intruders, etc in woodland where you've lived from 6-level months.
From crime-lab employers and detectives.
Bonus to Per to spot clues when no skill applies
From honourable opponents, Hard stylists, Lovers.
Bonus to be heard or to Intimidation after using a covered skill
From fellow explorers and backers.
Reduce distance and area class penalties for all skills
IQ-4+level roll as for Empathy
From elder Things.
From potential Buyers.
Roll appropriate skill to scrounge equipment for other covered skills and apply level against the penalty.  Shift rolls to avoid ill effects from mysterious artifacts by level in either direction.
From passengers; gamblers betting on you at the Grand Prix.
Bonus on Per rolls to notice dangers in the path of your ride: running children, oncoming vehicles, landmines...
From coreligionists and sympathizers.
Bonus to will to resist "evil influences"
From other computer professionals, AI systems, and robots.
From local peasantry, clients, and acolytes.

A roll at IQ-4, +1/level of Cunning Folk, to notice anything odd – curses, blights, faeries in the basement, etc. – that happens to animals, crops, or people in an area where you’ve lived for at least (6 - Cunning Folk level) months.
From other cultures in their lands.
Bonus in contests against covered skills
From computer professionals and AIs.
Reduce Familiarity penalties for computers. Roll Hacking/Programming to improvise software to reduce equipment penalty.
From audiences, circus performers, vaudevillians, and fellow fools.
Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.
From those who respect nature.
IQ-4+Level to notice disturbances in nature
From demons.
From any fellow “religious professional”.
IQ-4+Level to notice omens and blessed items
From anyone for whom you use your skills.
Less-severe penalties from Familiarity (p. B169) – which can run to -10 in certain cases (see p. B189) – when using any skill to operate unfamiliar gear that runs on electricity.
From anyone with whom you do business.
To all rolls to find hirelings or jobs (pp. B517-518)
To will rolls to resist others' attempts to use Influence skills to scam money.
From military officers, tribal war-leaders, soldiers, and other professional warriors.
Bonus to initiative rolls if leader
From hackers; people buying stock in your dot-com.
Less-severe penalties from Familiarity (p. B169) for unfamiliar computer equipment,
Success at Computer Hacking or Computer Programming lets you improvise code that removes -1/level from the penalty for not having proper software for a task that requires it (p. B345).
From anyone you serve with or command.
Bonus to initiative rolls if leader
From professional Spacers.
Bonus to ST for zero G push off
Counteracts Familiarity for spacecraft.
From those you serve with or command.
Reduce chance of impersonal battlefield hazards
From sailors.
To resist seasickness
To reduce unfamiliarity penalties for systems on an appropriate boat or ship
From crowds.
Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.
From all animals.
From audiences and fellow bards.
Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.
From employers.
Eliminate -1/level to a skill with success on another to improvise tools; Apply to Enigmatic Device Table rolls and other unskilled tech rolls.
From devotees of the old and beautiful.
Counteract Time penalties (p. B176) when dealing with old sruff
Counteract Tech-Level Modifiers (p. B168) when dealing with sciences of a lower TL
From all ordinary animals.
From anyone attracted to your specific combination of race and sex; people who might employ you as an actress, courtesan, or model.
From aliens.
From students and teachers.
Bonus to any roll that benefits from Eidetic Memory

features.situation: to all skill rolls using your @Specific Non-Combat Tool@

features.situation: From sneaky people and anyone who catches you in the act.
Bonus to others' rolls to notice or remember you
From anyone who would react poorly to Cowardice.
From anyone you try to impress.
Penalty to resist Influence skills and manipulation
From anybody who values knowledge.
Penalty anywhere Eidetic Memory would give a bonus
From athletes, fitness nuts, and anyone with higher HT than you.
Penalty to recover from injuries due to physical feats
From all animals, all the time.
Penalty to evaluate animals
